meta.job_title: CDL Class A New Vehicle Delivery Driver/Trainer

duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver vehicles to end users and perform training to customers and suppliers on company products.
Ensure questions are answered accurately and all documentation is completed timely.
Conduct operator orientation and training sessions based on new vehicle customer specifications.
Deliver new vehicles and conduct training sessions at various customer locations, with an expected volume of 25 to 40 training sessions per year.
Participate in planning and implementing travel arrangements within travel guidelines.
Perform other duties and/or projects as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED); or one to three years related experience and/or training. Commercial driver’s license required.
